channel.title: Pages on Uhkrowi
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Uhkrowi

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name’s Nurul. I’m currently working as a freelance web developer. This site is a place where I show my works and share some of my experiences and learnings about software development and web technology in general. You can find me at Facebook, LinkedIn or Telegram. Experience Full-stack Web Developer PT Idea Nusantara Cipta Apr 2021 - present As A Freelance Web Developer. Building a research management application system of lecturers of Indonesia.

item.title: Attayasa
item.description: Tech stacks: WordPress REST API MySQL Vue.js Tailwind CSS

item.title: GMN
item.description: Company Profile Website of Graha Multimedia Nusantara. Tech stacks: WordPress REST API MySQL Tailwind CSS

item.title: Meeting Room Management
item.description: A mobile application for scheduling meeting with booking available rooms feature, note of MOM, participants invitation, extending meeting time if possible, order meals to the pantry, etc. Tech stacks: Laravel for REST API MySQL Flutter SQLite

item.title: Rental Housing Management
item.description: Rental flat, private and public housing in Indonesia for low economic citizen, supply and demand management of properties, facilitate citizen to book and rent house with ease. Tech Stacks: Go Vue.js 3 Quasar Tailwind CSS MySQL Heroku Screenshots: Demo URL: https://pupr-rental-housing.netlify.app/

item.title: Ship Rental Management
item.description: Ship rent management aim to ease fishermen to rent ships, including picking type of ship, setting rental period, extending the period, monitoring their payment. the application also helps the owners of rental to manage information about ships, their customers, payments and reports. Tech stacks: Laravel MySQL Vue.js Vuetify

item.title: Zumstar
item.description: Company Profile Website of Zumstar (product of Graha Multimedia Nusantara).

item.title: Project
item.description: Name Stacks Platform Billing Receipt Generator Electron, vue.js, HTML, CSS desktop link Zumstar Wordpress web link GMN Wordpress, vue.js, TailwindCSS web link Ship Rental Management Laravel, MySQL, vue.js, Vuetify web link Meeting Room Management Laravel, MySQL, Flutter, SQLite web, mobile link Rental Housing Management Go, MySQL, vue.js, Quasar, TailwindCSS web link Attayasa Wordpress, vue.js, TailwindCSS web link
